field.name: arch
field.xpath: colors="blue:state == 'startworking';geen:state == 'done';grey:state == 'draft';red:(state in ('pause','cancel'))"> green:state == 'done';grey:state == 'cancel';blue:state in ('startworking',);orange:state in ('draft') and real_date_planned>=current_date;red:real_date_planned<current_date and state in ('draft', 'confirmed', 'ready')

field.name: accounting_qty
field.help: Used for evaluate if production has correct quantity
